sqlGroup.sql: select U.username authorname,J.*,R.views from users U, job J left join job_record R on J.id=R.id where U.id=J.author and J.id= ?
select J.*,R.views from job J left join job_record R on J.id=R.id order by J.id asc limit 0,10
